name: Self-Streme
author: zvielkoren@github.com
description: A powerful self-hosted streaming server with Stremio integration. Stream your media library and torrent content with automatic quality detection and cross-device support.
startup: if [[ -d .git ]] && [[ {{AUTO_UPDATE}} == "1" ]]; then git pull; fi; if [[ ! -f .env ]]; then echo "PORT={{SERVER_PORT}}" > .env; echo "BASE_URL={{BASE_URL}}" >> .env; fi; npm install --production && npm start

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# Self-Streme Installation Script for Pterodactyl
set -e

cd /mnt/server

echo "==================================="
echo "Self-Streme Installation"
echo "==================================="

# Update packages
apt update
apt install -y git curl

# Clone repository if not exists
if [ -z "${GITHUB_REPO}" ]; then
    GITHUB_REPO="https://github.com/zvielkoren/self-streme.git"
fi

if [ -z "${BRANCH}" ]; then
    BRANCH="main"
fi

if [ -d .git ]; then
    echo "Repository already exists, updating..."
    git fetch origin
    git reset --hard origin/${BRANCH}
else
    echo "Cloning repository..."
    git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GITHUB_REPO} .
fi

# Install Node.js dependencies
echo "Installing dependencies..."
npm install --production

# Create necessary directories
mkdir -p media temp

# Create .env file
echo "Creating .env file..."
cat > .env << EOF
PORT=\${SERVER_PORT}
BASE_URL=\${BASE_URL}
MEDIA_PATH=./media
CACHE_BACKEND=memory
CACHE_MAX_SIZE=1000
CACHE_MAX_DISK_MB=5000
TORRENT_TIMEOUT=60000
TORRENT_MAX_RETRIES=3
EOF

echo "==================================="
echo "Installation Complete!"
echo "==================================="
echo "Configure your BASE_URL in the environment variables"
echo "Default port: 7000"
echo "Access your addon at: http://YOUR_IP:PORT/manifest.json"

variables.name: Server Port
variables.description: The port that Self-Streme will listen on

variables.name: Base URL
variables.description: The base URL for accessing Self-Streme (e.g., https://your-domain.com or http://YOUR_IP:7000). Leave empty for auto-detection.

variables.name: Auto Update
variables.description: Automatically pull latest changes from GitHub on startup

variables.name: Cache Backend
variables.description: Cache backend type: memory, sqlite, or redis

variables.name: Cache Max Disk MB
variables.description: Maximum disk usage for cache in MB
